Header: Venerable Dambara Amila Thera paid by a Gas Company
Content: It was confirmed in Court yesterday that the Venerable Dambara Amila Thera has obtained a huge amount as a monthly allowance from the Litro Gas Company. Media reports say that 57 persons who were linked to the political activities of the previous government have been given money as allowances by the Litro Gas Company. The Venerable Dambara Amila Thera staged protests during the past period requesting to come forward to fight against those who stole state property. He said this during the United National Party protest rally on the 15th of this month at the Lipton Roundabout in Colombo. However Lawyers connected to the Court Case say that they submitted a voucher to the Court confirming Venerable Dambara Amila Thera obtained cash from the Litro Gas Company. Venerable Amila Thera during a protest rally in Kandy recently recalled about his struggle against corruption by spending his own money. Meanwhile a Police complaint has been lodged in connection with Venerable Dambara Amila Thera obtaining money from the Litro Gas Company.
